name: Secret Place
description:
Secret Place is an: (A.) erotic experience about existential lust. (B.) Metaphysical document on relational constructs. (C.) lazerbeam burned through the prismatic heart of hope's dirty secret.

Featuring:

  • Words
  • Sensual words
  • Exclusive genre-defining two-player mode: Player One uses their voice to narrate the story while Player Two closes their eyes and creates the graphics in their mind!
  • Tension-breaking typos
  • Android Version: Now you don't have to try and sneak your laptop to the bathroom! Secret Place for Android allows you to enjoy Secret Place wherever your secret place may be.

What The Press Said:

The prose veered toward the purple – needlessly lyrical and florid – but, given that consensual sex is one of the most purple situations one can find oneself in, my inner editor was willing to let it slide. In fact I derived quite a bit of pleasure from basking in the ridiculous luxury of the language – and that's the sort of thing erotica's all about right? In fact, the writing is so lyrical that it's almost poetry… and I think I'm cool with an interactive sexy poem.

- Ben Meredith, Indie Haven

A Twine experience created in 7 hours for Ludum Dare 30: Connected Worlds
